Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; ENGRAVED; RELIEF
Name: Torch with inscription
Description: This terracotta torch of elongated form dates from the 5th - 6th centuries. It is distinguished by a ribbon handle and a small medallion decorated by a leaf. The ornamental border ends in an uneven canal towards the filling hole. On the shoulder, one notices the inscription "Tou agiou Kyriakos (sic)" ("of the Saint Kyriakos").
